newsitem.title: UK: Swiss Bank unit sets 400 mln mark bond.
newsitem.headline: Swiss Bank unit sets 400 mln mark bond.

text.p: The following subordinated bond was announced by lead manager SBC Warburg.
BORROWER SWISS BANK CORP, JERSEY BRANCH
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE 101.07 PAY DATE 06.DEC.96
FULL FEES 2.5 BP REOFFER 98.97 SPREAD +60 BP
MOODY AA2 LISTING FFT LON PAY FREQ =
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW ENG/SWISS HOME CTRY = TAX PROVS =
